name: tachyons-border-radius
description: Border radius CSS module for Tachyons

scripts.start: tachyons src/tachyons-border-radius.css > css/tachyons-border-radius.css && tachyons src/tachyons-border-radius.css --minify > css/tachyons-border-radius.min.css && tachyons src/tachyons-border-radius.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
